subject: Order #SSN2425
description_text:
Hello, on August 22nd I placed an order for some PRO X ULTRA pedals.
I received an order confirmation email with the number #SSN2425.
Do I need to do anything else? What is the estimated time for shipping?
Regards!!!

conversations.body_text: Hello, due to the war, Israel has limited shipping channels. We are currently looking for a suitable channel. The lowest price is currently 950 RMB, which is equivalent to 132.84 USD, via FedEx or DHL express, with delivery in 3-7 days. If you are in a hurry, we can arrange for this shipping channel, but you will need to cover the 29 USD shipping fee. Is that acceptable?

Hi, I'm fine if it's just that amount.
How do I pay?
________________________________
De: service@simsonn.com

Hi Nicolas Bonvicini,    Okay, thank you for your understanding. We will ship your order as soon as possible. You can click on this link to make payment.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2

Perfect, I've already made the payment.
I'm waiting for the tracking number, thank you very much.
Best regards!!
________________________________
De: service@simsonn.com
